articles.title: French film legend and amateur racer Jean-Louis Trintignant dies aged 91 after cancer battle - Daily Mail
articles.description: French screen legend Jean-Louis Trintignant has died aged 91. The film star won acclaim during a 74-year career in Oscar, BAFTA and Palme d'Or-winning films including Amour and The Conformist
articles.content:
French film legend Jean-Louis Trintignant, who in a 74-year career became one of his country's finest actors, has died aged 91.
